body_html:
@Shentongmo Thanks for your reply!

What do you mean by saying “the suitable value of batch_size or max_iter”?
I run the defualt config tutorial_2gpu_e2e_faster_rcnn_R-50-FPN.yaml in COCO17 dataset, where the MAX_ITER: 30000 BATCH_SIZE_PER_IM: 256 IMS_PER_BATCH: 2

Do you have a heuristic method to choose “the suitable value of batch_size or max_iter”? What is the exactly problem bought by batch_size and max_iter in your try?

Thanks again~
